entry.title: When I was still in the public service, There was also little risk of a bad government. I was happy in my dream job. Serving the people of Singapore, by growing our reserves strategically was meaningful work. At that stage of my life, that was the best wa
entry.content: When I was still in the public service, There was also little risk of a bad government. I was happy in my dream job. Serving the people of Singapore, by growing our reserves strategically was meaningful work. At that stage of my life, that was the best way I could contribute to Singapore. Now I want to safeguard the reserves I have helped to grow. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: My fellow Singaporeans, On National Day, we celebrated the three national treasures that define our country Singapore as exceptional. I am standing for President to protect these three treasures. The first treasure is our reserves. I can protect the r
entry.content: My fellow Singaporeans, On National Day, we celebrated the three national treasures that define our country Singapore as exceptional. I am standing for President to protect these three treasures. The first treasure is our reserves. I can protect the reserves . I spent my entire career at GIC and MAS helping to build up our reserves. Our second treasure is good public administration. I have worked in 45 years in public service, I have what it takes to uphold the integrity of [key] public service appointments. Our third treasure is our social stability, where Singaporeans have lived in peace and harmony, regardless of race, religion or political affiliation. I do not belong to any political party and so I am well placed to unite the people of Singapore to face an uncertain future. For these three reasons, I humbly ask you, my fellow Singaporeans, to choose me as your President. ÊàëÊòØÈªÑÂõΩÊùæÔºåËØ∑ÊäïÊàë‰∏ÄÁ•® Nama saya Ng Kok Song. Saya berharap anda undilah saya. ‡Æ®‡Ææ‡Æ©‡Øç ‡Æá‡Æô‡Øç ‡Æï‡Øä‡Æï‡Øç ‡Æö‡Øä‡Æô‡Øç. ‡Æ®‡ÆÆ‡Øç‡Æ™‡Æø‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡Øà‡ÆØ‡ØÅ‡Æü‡Æ©‡Øç ‡Æé‡Æ©‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡ØÅ ‡Æµ‡Ææ‡Æï‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≥‡Æø‡ÆØ‡ØÅ‡Æô‡Øç‡Æï‡Æ≥‡Øç! Thank you. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.content: Here‚Äôs what mornings look like for me! Toast & kopi while my baby, Max accompanies me. I was sharing with him earlier today that Papa was off to Mediacorp to record a broadcast message. He is very attached üòÇ‚ù§Ô∏è! Stay tuned for my message tomorrow when it airs. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture #catsoftiktok #catlovers #cattok

entry.title: Last Sunday I had the chance to intimately meet with all of these amazing founders and creators! They come from very different and diverse industries. But all of us are Singaporeans, playing a crucial part in the stability of our future. I explained to th
entry.content: Last Sunday I had the chance to intimately meet with all of these amazing founders and creators! They come from very different and diverse industries. But all of us are Singaporeans, playing a crucial part in the stability of our future. I explained to them the role our reserves play in ensuring sustainable growth for every industry. I want to help all of us do our part to uplift our nation‚Äôs financial literacy. This will ensure a level playing field for our youths and that more people are included in wealth accumulation. As President I am inspired to share my years of knowledge with you. I will also use it to safeguard our reserves with competence and integrity! #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: This is my official candidate symbol: Five fingers representing Singaporeans of different races and religions, and the heart of the palm representing our common ground. In spite of our differences, we must stand united to face of an uncertain future. I hu
entry.content: This is my official candidate symbol: Five fingers representing Singaporeans of different races and religions, and the heart of the palm representing our common ground. In spite of our differences, we must stand united to face of an uncertain future. I humbly ask for your vote so I can unite our country as your next President. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: This is my take on timing the market. I spent 45 years making strategic decisions investing our national reserves. I had to take calculated risks to ensure our nation‚Äôs financial wealth accumulated without compromising our stability. I have the necessary
entry.content: This is my take on timing the market. I spent 45 years making strategic decisions investing our national reserves. I had to take calculated risks to ensure our nation‚Äôs financial wealth accumulated without compromising our stability. I have the necessary experience to safeguard our financial defence. I hope to uplift our nation‚Äôs financial literacy by sharing more of my knowledge. #unitedforourfuture #ngkoksong2023 #finance #adulting #adultmoney

entry.title: The best bet I made in the GIC was before the 2008 global financial crisis. I proposed to significantly de-risk the GIC‚Äôs portfolio while everyone else was very optimistic about the market. It was tough convincing the board of my contrary recommendation b
entry.content: The best bet I made in the GIC was before the 2008 global financial crisis. I proposed to significantly de-risk the GIC‚Äôs portfolio while everyone else was very optimistic about the market. It was tough convincing the board of my contrary recommendation but I remained firm with the intention to protect our reserves. I am glad I made the right judgment call and that I had the privilege to work with people who believed in me. As President, I will ensure the best judgment call is made when it comes to safeguarding our reserves. #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: I‚Äôm not going to lie, I love playing Mahjong! üòÇ Like many of you, I watched my parents play and was intrigued by the strategy it took to master the game. It wasn‚Äôt about betting. You have to master memory and observation to strategically plan your move ev
entry.content: I‚Äôm not going to lie, I love playing Mahjong! üòÇ Like many of you, I watched my parents play and was intrigued by the strategy it took to master the game. It wasn‚Äôt about betting. You have to master memory and observation to strategically plan your move every round. Part of it involves some aspect of risk. If you‚Äôre good at Mahjong, use your interest to develop into life skills! I am sure many of you have what it takes. To bridge the gap in our youth‚Äôs financial literacy, we can consider fun ways to educate ourselves! #ngkoksong2023 #unitedforourfuture

entry.title: The first place I went to after my nomination, was Kangkar (Hougang). When my son pointed out the exact spot we used to live in, I was overwhelmed with gratitude and emotions. I had to give up my scholarship to study overseas as my father lost his voice a
entry.content: The first place I went to after my nomination, was Kangkar (Hougang). When my son pointed out the exact spot we used to live in, I was overwhelmed with gratitude and emotions. I had to give up my scholarship to study overseas as my father lost his voice and could not work. I studied with a local bursary and secured a job in the government to support my family and lift them out of poverty. I want every Singaporean to know that they can make it in life too. I was just a poor boy from Kangkar. Now, I‚Äôm running to be your President. I want to inspire others who don‚Äôt have a fair start in life, to never give up on their hopes and dreams. #unitedforourfuture #ngkoksong2023

entry.title: After my morning visit to the market today, Max was waiting for me as usual. He is such a good boy and he always gives us his full time and attention. He even understands Teochew! I am always so happy to see him waiting when I open my door! Now, I‚Äôm heade
entry.content: After my morning visit to the market today, Max was waiting for me as usual. He is such a good boy and he always gives us his full time and attention. He even understands Teochew! I am always so happy to see him waiting when I open my door! Now, I‚Äôm headed off to meet all of you at these sessions! ‚ù§Ô∏è ABC Brickworks Market and Food Centre Time: 12:30pm - 1:30pm Chomp Chomp Food Centre Time: 7:00pm - 8:00pm #unitedforourfuture #ngkoksong2023 #catsoftiktok #catlovers #cats
